items.name: Resilience Gardens & Family Park
items.short_description: A sprawling green oasis offering playgrounds, picnic spots, and tranquil walking trails, symbolizing Maiduguri's peaceful resurgence. It's a perfect retreat for families and individuals seeking relaxation.
items.address: Off Sir Kashim Ibrahim Way, Old GRA, Maiduguri

items.name: Borno Heritage & Arts Centre
items.short_description: Discover the rich history and vibrant artistic expressions of Borno State. This modern center hosts exhibitions, workshops, and performances, celebrating local culture and traditions.
items.address: Along Damboa Road, Opp. University of Maiduguri, Maiduguri

items.name: Maiduguri Gateway Mall
items.short_description: The city's newest and most comprehensive shopping destination, featuring a variety of local and international brands, a food court, and entertainment options. Experience modern retail therapy in the heart of Maiduguri.

items.name: Future Forward Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic space dedicated to empowering youth through technology, entrepreneurship, and skill development. It offers co-working spaces, training programs, and networking events for the next generation of Maiduguri leaders.
items.address: GRA Extension, Near Federal Secretariat, Maiduguri

items.name: Peace Arena Sports Complex
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility featuring pitches for football, basketball courts, and a gym. Itâ€™s a community hub promoting health, fitness, and friendly competition among residents.

items.name: Taste of Borno Food Village
items.short_description: A vibrant outdoor food court showcasing the best of traditional Borno and Nigerian cuisine. Enjoy authentic flavors, fresh ingredients, and a lively atmosphere perfect for culinary exploration.
items.address: Old Maiduguri Road, Near Monday Market, Maiduguri

items.name: Green Sanctuary Botanical Garden
items.short_description: A meticulously curated botanical garden dedicated to showcasing the diverse flora of the Sahel region and beyond. It serves as a research center and a serene escape for nature lovers.
items.address: Maiduguri-Konduga Road, Adjacent to New GRA, Maiduguri

items.name: Sahel Gallery & Workshop
items.short_description: An inspiring contemporary art space displaying works from emerging and established artists from Borno and across Nigeria. Engage in art workshops or simply admire diverse expressions of creativity.

items.name: Maiduguri Peace & Unity Square
items.short_description: A significant public square featuring a striking monument dedicated to peace and unity, commemorating Maiduguri's resilience. It's a place for reflection, public gatherings, and community events.

items.name: Fun Oasis Entertainment Zone
items.short_description: Maiduguri's premier indoor family entertainment center, offering arcade games, soft play areas for kids, and mini-golf. It's the perfect spot for family outings and celebrations.
items.address: Bolori Layout, Off Kashim Ibrahim Road, Maiduguri
